name: Project Monkey
description:
"Monkeys island is been hit by an earthquake, can you keep monkey alive by avoiding the lava."

Space to Jump and arrow keys to move forward and backward.

A unity game made during Global Game Jam 2017 by a team of 5 people. The level is procedurally generated.

Team Banana - Dónall O'Donoghue (Audio), Cillian Lambe (Designer), Salum Muhammad (Designer), David Tuohy (Programmer/Writer), Abhiroop Tandon (Programmer)

Our Game Jam Site -> Project Monkey
